title: Top tech topics in 2025 ( 1 ): a year of strategic realignment for global semiconductors
description: As 2025 draws to a close, the global semiconductor industry has undergone a fundamental transformation marked by heightened geopolitical tensions, supply chain restructuring, and an unprecedented surge in AI-driven demand. What distinguishes this year from previous cycles is the shift from aspirational roadmaps to hard-edged execution, where manufacturers must deliver not just technological advancement but reliable, scalable production under increasingly complex constraints.

# Top tech topics in 2025 (1): a year of strategic realignment for global semiconductors

Jerry Chen, DIGITIMES Asia, TaipeiTuesday 30 December 2025 [0](https://www.digitimes.com/newsshow/comment.asp?datePublish=2025/12/29&pages=VL&seq=211)

Facebook

|     |
| --- |
| ![](https://static.xx.fbcdn.net/rsrc.php/v4/yD/r/FEppCFCt76d.png)Like0 |

![](https://img.digitimes.com/newsshow/20251229vl211_files/2_b.jpg)

Credit: AFP

As 2025 draws to a close, the global semiconductor industry has undergone a fundamental transformation marked by heightened geopolitical tensions, supply chain restructuring, and an unprecedented surge in AI-driven demand. What distinguishes this year from previous cycles is the shift from aspirational roadmaps to hard-edged execution, where manufacturers must deliver not just technological advancement but reliable, scalable production under increasingly complex constraints.

Four major themes defined the year for chips: the advanced process race mov
